title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-4.10 - Food product thermometers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 §§ 271-4.10 - Food product thermometers

State Regulations

Indicating thermometers required for immersion into food
or cooking media shall be of metal stem-type construction, numerically scaled
and accurate to plus or minus 2°F (congruent to plus or minus
1°C). Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
§§
271-4.10

Repealed

New

York State Register June 22, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 25, eff. 6/22/2016

Adopted

New

York State Register December 21, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 51, eff. 12/21/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
